title: Green Shakshuka
ingredients: 4 big handfuls greens (mix kale & spinach), chopped and washed
instructions: Saute onions & garlic in olive oil in a large skillet until they take on a little color. Add jalapeno and continue cooking for 1-2 minutes. Add chopped greens, season with salt and pepper to taste and cover until greens are just wilted. Add cream and bring to a simmer. Crack eggs on top of greens, cover and cook until eggs are cooked to your preference. Serve in wide bowls with a dollop of yogurt and a drizzle of hot sauce and thick slices of warm bread on the side.
